data.title: Sodagreen
data.text:
The Story

What started as a college indie-band, meant to end at the end of graduation, has now become one of the most successful musical acts to come out of Taiwan.

From taking their original name "Soda" and vicariously adding "green" to the end, Sodagreen have written beloved tunes like "Little Love Song" and "I Miss You So" and collaborated with many different artist through their career.

Wu Qingfeng

Lead Singer

Birthdate: August 13, 1982

Lead vocalist of Sodagreen, he has also written a series of songs for other musical artists, and won for a Golden Melody Award for Best Composition in 2007 and another Golden Melody Award for Best Lyrics in 2016.

Claire Hsieh

Basist

Birthdate: April 16, 1982

The bassist and sole female member of Sodagreen. She graduated with a degree in Geotechnical Engineering and has co-written the lyrics to a few of the band's songs off their 2013 album, "Autumn : Story"

Wei Shi

Drummer

Harmonicist

Birthdate: August 26, 1979

One of the founding members of Sodagreen. He is one of the primary songwriters of the band.

Afu Ho

Acoustic Guitarist

Ukuleleist

Birthdate: April 4, 1982

Affectionately nicknamed "Smiling Afu," he is the Sodagreen's acoustic guitarist and leader. Even when serving in the military from 2010 to 2011, the band continued on under his direction as "Six Without Two."

Kay Liu

Electric Guitarist

Birthdate: February 5, 1982

Joining the group in 2003, he is the group's lead guitarist. He has also participated in a temporary group "Knock Nak" while he completed his further studies at the Berklee College of Music.

Kung Yuchi

Keyboardist

Violist

Birthdate: December, 1980

After joining the final lineup of the band in 2003, he is the group's primary keyboardist and violist. He is heavily involved in the productioin and arragement of a majority of Sodagreen's discography.
